outcome: Branch B: The Double Reversal – The BCI's scoring algorithms abruptly invert, granting high access and privileges in historically low-score districts while penalizing former model citizens. Council factions scramble to respond as the social order is upended and citizens rebel against arbitrary fairness.

events.description: Residents in formerly low-scoring districts wake up to maximum BCI privileges, while established model districts are locked out of services and face sudden shortages.
Factions issue contradictory statements: some hail the change as system correction, others demand immediate rollback. Mass protests erupt in suddenly disadvantaged districts.
Petrak and Daria discover remnants of a 2023 'reverse index' experiment in the BCI's codebase. Council members scramble to contain leaks that reveal intentional algorithm tampering.
Groups in privileged zones organize redistribution campaigns in solidarity, while others retaliate and sabotage city infrastructure in protest.
The Council is forced into emergency talks as citywide unrest escalates and residents demand transparency, sparking a deep debate about what fairness and justice should mean in Stenograd.
